Articles.Content:
I posted this in modded installs, but I don't think the problem is a mod issue, but I have mods. Anyways, it seems that about 1/20 clicks I do in the editor when selecting or deleting a part freezes my game for  second, and hen KSP stops responding (Crashes).

           If anybody knows why this happens or has a solution, I would be extremely grateful.

 

          Thanks,

             John
This is a known issue and there is no current workaround - it's waiting on 1.1.3 or possibly the U5.3/.4 upgrade in 1.2

4 hours ago, Gojira1000 said:

It seems the same type problem also persist when changing between different ships via brackets. It is very useful for cinematics, lol. Thank you for the reply
